content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help schedule your HVAC service. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Robert. Could you please provide your service address so I can confirm our availability in your area?
Thank you. Please hold for a moment while I check if this address is within our service area.

It appears that the address you provided is outside of our service area. Unfortunately, I cannot proceed with scheduling your service at this location. I am escalating this to a human operator for further assistance.
reason: Address outside service area and unable to proceed
